div.div: TRACY MORGAN KEPT HIS SHIRT ON

div.a: Behind The Scenes At The Final Days Of '30 Rock'

div.div: Swordplay! Solemn introspection! Intense feelings for inanimate objects! Tom Ceraulo, writer for the beloved, imminently departing comedy, reflects on his time in the trenches.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VycmjC&via=Digg&text=Behind The Scenes At The Final Days Of '30 Rock'

div.a: What Happens When You Walk Into A Bar Wearing Google Glasses

div.div: Two people wearing Google Glasses walk into a bar. Nope, that's the whole joke.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W2ZSgu&via=Digg&text=What Happens When You Walk Into A Bar Wearing Google Glasses

div.a: Applebee’s Fires Waitress For Exposing Pastor’s ‘Give God 10%’ No-Tip Receipt

div.div: A waitress says she was fired from her job at Applebee’s after posting a note from a pastor who refused to tip, writing that “I give God 10% Why do you get 18.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TguVHc&via=Digg&text=Applebee’s Fires Waitress For Exposing Pastor’s ‘Give God 10%’ No-Tip Receipt

div.a: How Your Pocket Change Can Save The Internet

div.div: If you read content on the Internet (which you do), soon you'll be able to throw a few cents at the stuff you like most.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VISUyZ&via=Digg&text=How Your Pocket Change Can Save The Internet

div.a: Burger King Will Start DNA Testing For Horse Meat

div.div: Just to be clear: Burger King says there is no horse meat in its burgers. And just to make sure, Burger King tells Bloomberg Businessweek, it plans to test its beef patties for foreign DNA, including horse, pork, and lamb.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WVAjh2&via=Digg&text=Burger King Will Start DNA Testing For Horse Meat

div.a: This Penguin Is About To Be Eaten By A Leopard Seal

div.div: Have a look at this photo revealing the final terrifying moments of a young penguin before he is met with the jaws of a hungry leopard seal.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X78FMg&via=Digg&text=This Penguin Is About To Be Eaten By A Leopard Seal

div.div: ALL OF HULU AND MOST OF YOUTUBE

div.a: What A $4 Mil. Super Bowl Ad Could Buy In Digital

div.div: The digital industry regularly complains it doesn’t see the level of big-brand ad investment TV does, so we thought it’d be interesting to figure out how far $4 million would go in the world of digital advertising.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10YGLEw&via=Digg&text=What A $4 Mil. Super Bowl Ad Could Buy In Digital

div.div: If you mess with Orlando's sassiest news reporter Jessica Sanchez when she's in the middle of a Super Bowl segment, she'll verbally gut you like a fish.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WCtmDl&via=Digg&text=TV Reporter Gets Last Laugh

div.div: CRUISE WAS GENIUS IN 'PEPE LOVES TACOS'

div.a: These Outrageous Chinese DVD Movie Copies Are Hilarious

div.div: I may have a bad memory, but I don't remember "Matrix Reloaded" to be about "white men wanting a stud to breed slaves." Or Arnold Swarchenegger starring in Star Wars. Or a Tom Cruise movie called "Pepe Likes Tacos." But, if you are in China, that's exactly what happens.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XpFCVR&via=Digg&text=These Outrageous Chinese DVD Movie Copies Are Hilarious

div.div: FROM ANT TO CITY AND BEYOND

div.a: A History of All Things Sim

div.div: Most video games have clear goals: rescue the princess, defeat the enemy, earn the most points. But in the long-running Sim franchises, the goals are much less tangible. With a new SimCity coming to stores soon, it seems like a good time to look back at the history of these world-changing, world-building games.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vys4LK&via=Digg&text=A History of All Things Sim

div.a: The Psychology Of An Internet Troll

div.div: This infographic provides a deeper look into the psychology of internet trolls.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YmcMH2&via=Digg&text=The Psychology Of An Internet Troll

div.a: The Horrific Crash That Took The Life Of The First X-Games Contestant

div.div: Video of the terrible crash at the X-Games that ended up causing the death of contestant Caleb Brown.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W2JkFs&via=Digg&text=The Horrific Crash That Took The Life Of The First X-Games Contestant

div.div: MARTIAL LAW IS BASICALLY REGULAR LAW THERE
Kim Jong Un has placed North Korea under martial law, and has told his troops to prepare for war, South Korean media reported. .

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WDnI0E&via=Digg&text=North Korea Declares Martial Law

div.a: What Google Searches About The Future Tell Us About The Present

div.div: Research published today demonstrates how searches about the future have a strong link to economic success.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WA7SXW&via=Digg&text=What Google Searches About The Future Tell Us About The Present

div.a: This Text Editor Can Help You Explain The Hardest Things In The Easiest Words

div.div: One of the hardest things about communicating science is taking technical language and translating it into everyday English. That's where the Up-Goer Five text editor comes in, a widget which restricts writers to the 1000 most commonly used words in the English language.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xogcrx&via=Digg&text=This Text Editor Can Help You Explain The Hardest Things In The Easiest Words

div.div: How the country’s biggest gun-rights group thwarts regulation and helps put military-grade weapons in the hands of killers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Th3XiJ&via=Digg&text=The NRA Vs. America

div.div: "30 Rock" understood the phony limitations of race even as it grasped how much a part of American life it is. This is what separated it from "Chappelle's Show," which grasped how racism was a fact of life — its glass-half-empty gleaning of race in America was the source of its nuclear power.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Th1dSm&via=Digg&text='30 Rock,' Race, And Identity Politics

div.div: Actors say the film "was done with the utmost love, admiration, and respect."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W2HIM3&via=Digg&text='jOBS' Actors Address Criticism From Woz

div.a: Old School Video Game Characters In Real Life

div.div: Taking characters like King Koopa and E. Honda from Street Fighter, Aled Lewis juxtaposed their pixelated goodness into photos that correlated nicely.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14tGAos&via=Digg&text=Old School Video Game Characters In Real Life

div.a: Bootlegged 'Argo' DVDs Taking Iran By Storm

div.div: "Argo" is taking Tehran by storm, circulating hand to hand and house to house. Young hipsters in northern Tehran, fruit peddlers in the bazaar, teachers in the suburbs, parliamentarians and members of the plainclothes Basij militia loyal to the regime have seen it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WSjOSG&via=Digg&text=Bootlegged 'Argo' DVDs Taking Iran By Storm

div.a: How NASA Selects It's Yearly Crop Of Astronauts

div.div: What is 'the right stuff' for a trip to Mars?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wi00dZ&via=Digg&text=How NASA Selects It's Yearly Crop Of Astronauts

div.a: How The U.S. Military Uses IRC To Wage War

div.div: Despite the U.S. military’s massive spending each year on advanced communications technology, the use of simple text chat or tactical chat has outpaced other systems to become one of the most popular paths for communicating practical information on the battlefield.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V2X2Gg&via=Digg&text=How The U.S. Military Uses IRC To Wage War

div.div: YET BUD LIGHT LIME CONTINUES TO FLOW FREELY

div.a: Justice Department Sues To Stop Budweiser Maker From Taking Over Corona

div.div: Federal authorities allege that Anheuser-Busch InBev's $20.1 billion takeover of Grupo Modelo, announced in June, would "substantially lessen competition in the market for beer in the United States as a whole."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11mXkKP&via=Digg&text=Justice Department Sues To Stop Budweiser Maker From Taking Over Corona

div.div: In honor of National Curmudgeon Day, here are words to allow you to grumble, complain, grouse, kvetch, and whine to your heart's (dis)content.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TeYtVu&via=Digg&text=A Short-Tempered History Of The 'Curmudgeon'

div.a: Here's A Gorgeous Map Of All The Submarine Cables That Bring You Your Internet

div.div: NOTE: All your clicks to this amazing map may have overloaded its servers. Load times will probably be either very slow or non-existent.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11eWqo0&via=Digg&text=Here's A Gorgeous Map Of All The Submarine Cables That Bring You Your Internet

div.a: This Giant, Floating Airship From NASA And The Military Gets Closer To Flight

div.div: The helium-powered Pelican will be able to carry 66 tons of cargo, and doesn't need a runway to take off or land.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U2xQot&via=Digg&text=This Giant, Floating Airship From NASA And The Military Gets Closer To Flight

div.div: FOR TODAY'S YOUNG HIPSTER WHITE SUPREMACISTS

div.a: Stephen Colbert Gives The Ku Klux Klan Rebranding Tips

div.div: The Ku Klux Klan, with its membership rapidly declining, is attempting to mend its racist brand. One member speaking to a local Fox News team employs a bit of spin to say that the KKK isn't a hate group. "We don't hate anyone," the hooded member pleads. "We just want to see good things come to our race."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U20iXB&via=Digg&text=Stephen Colbert Gives The Ku Klux Klan Rebranding Tips

div.div: There's a place I know in Ontario where the sea lions are buried in mass graves.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YGJxTh&via=Digg&text=Marineland Is A Hellhole

div.a: Shocking Before And After Pictures Of China's Smog Problem

div.div: Since the beginning of this year, the levels of air pollution in Beijing have been dangerously high, with thick clouds of smog chasing people indoors, disrupting air travel, and affecting the health of millions.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WR5xFX&via=Digg&text=Shocking Before And After Pictures Of China's Smog Problem

div.a: The Spy Novelist Who Knows Too Much

div.div: Other pop novelists, like John le Carré and Tom Clancy, may flavor their work with a few real-world scenarios and some spy lingo, but de Villiers’s books are ahead of the news and sometimes even ahead of events themselves.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xmajeu&via=Digg&text=The Spy Novelist Who Knows Too Much

div.div: WHEN YOU CAN'T LOWER THE SHADES

div.a: Webcam Spy 'Sextorted' Hundreds Of Women, FBI Says

div.div: A man who may have coerced as many as 350 women to strip for him via webcam has been arrested by the FBI on federal computer-hacking charges.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UEmp4a&via=Digg&text=Webcam Spy 'Sextorted' Hundreds Of Women, FBI Says

div.a: Lip Reading Arguments Between Baseball Managers And Umpires

div.div: What are angry baseball managers saying when they're on the field? Are they genuinely angry, or are they really—as has been reported at times—complaining about their own players or expressing their admiration for the men they’re believed to be berating?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/1483did&via=Digg&text=Lip Reading Arguments Between Baseball Managers And Umpires

div.div: ANY JOKE WE MAKE WILL GET US IN TROUBLE

div.a: Men Are Taking Their Grindr Profile Pics At The Holocaust Memorial Now

div.div: Nothing says cultured AND hard-bodied like going shirtless in honor of Holocaust victims.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XKcdnF&via=Digg&text=Men Are Taking Their Grindr Profile Pics At The Holocaust Memorial Now

div.a: Why Secretary Is Still The Top Job For Women

div.div: What's the most common job for American women? The same as it was in the 1950s: secretary.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WBsy1f&via=Digg&text=Why Secretary Is Still The Top Job For Women
